name: Cosmic Golf (evindor)
description:
Use gravity to send space balls into black holes.

A small game made in Godot for Major Jam: Cosmic.

You have to cheat to win the game. Find a way.

Hint: who said you can only shoot once?

Game updated 17th August addressing some comments form players:

  • limited the amount of force you can throw the ball with
  • made it easier to grab onto the ball

Original jam submission is available for download as per jam rules, see files.
